name: Droneployee of the Month (Futuregames, Sarah Norén - Zeevi, Bjorn Toreld, OskarWistedt, Oliver, Mani Javdani)
name_original: Droneployee of the Month (Futuregames, Sarah Norén - Zeevi, Bjorn Toreld, OskarWistedt, Oliver, Mani Javdani)
description:
You are a drone with one simple assignment: follow orders and deliver goods across the factory floor. This would be an easy task if the person controlling you wasn’t sleeping on the job, but alas – you need to take matters into your own hands. But the world is dangerous for a little drone like you - do you have what it takes to get the job done and earn Droneployee Of The Month?

Developed during GP1 at Futuregames.
